member.name: M:evec.Common.Settings.Save
member.summary: Saves settings

member.name: M:evec.Common.Settings.Load
member.summary: Loads the settings from the file
member.remarks: If the settings file is 0 length or fails to load, then look for a backup copy and ask if that is to be used. Once a settings file is loaded, a backup is taken as a 'last good settings file'
member.returns: A Settings object loaded from file

member.summary: Creates the location string for the settings file

member.name: M:evec.Common.Settings.LoadSettingsFile(System.String)
member.summary: Does the heavy lifting of getting the settings file from the location

member.summary: Evaluate the result of the restore message box and either creates a new settings file or loads the backup
member.param: The location of the backup file
The location of where the settings file will end up
The status of the message box
